title: The Q Anon 'Shaman' & The Return of the Mythic
description:
In the last week so many of the topics that Rebel Wisdom has been covering burst onto the world stage, the birth of new religions, the overlap between spirituality and conspiracy/Q Anon, and more, all personified in the iconic image of the "Q Anon Shaman", leading the mob that stormed the seat of American democracy.

In this film, we try to pull apart the deeper strands of mythology, religious fervour and high weirdness with three experts in the esoteric, Erik Davis, Gary Lachman and Jules Evans.

We will have a Sensemaker's Q&A on this topic on Wednesday 20th January at 8pm UK, to join, check out memberships: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

For more on this topic, see some of our films from the last months:

Spirituality & Conspiracy. What's Going On? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cZHZHygS3Es

Decoding Culture: New Religions. Jonathan Pageau & Jules Evans: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fbjTVwM_MC0

Erik's writings: https://www.burningshore.com/

Jules's writings: https://julesevans.medium.com/

Gary's writings: https://garylachman.co.uk/

Our groundbreaking and hugely popular course, Sensemaking 101, begins again in February: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/courses
